description.fr:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Vous perdez le combat si aucun allié n'est autour de la {Summoning:840!} ou si elle meurt.</rem></color>
description.en:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
You lose the fight if an ally is not around {Summoning:840!} or if she dies.</rem></color>
description.es:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Pierdes el combate si no hay ningún aliado alrededor de la {Summoning:840!} o si muere.</rem></color>
description.de:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Du verlierst den Kampf, falls sich kein Verbündeter ringsum der {Summoning:840!} befindet oder falls sie stirbt.</rem></color>
description.pt:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>{%FightTurnStartedMonsters}
Você perde o combate se nenhum aliado estiver em\_volta\_da {Summoning:840!} ou se ela morrer.</rem></color>
